attributes.action: UK Govt suspend Mortgage payments for the duration of the coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details: To soften the financial impact of COVID19 upon families struggling to cope with the inability to work as normal.  Working from home is not an option for everyone.
attributes.background: We request the UK follows Italy's example and suspend mortgage payments during the Coronavirus crisis. Mortgage holidays would alleviate the extra stress on families already worrying about loss of income.
